terms.title: [HI] Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: [HI] Please read these terms carefully before using our B2B marketplace platform. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.welcomeDesc: [HI] These Terms of Service govern your use of our premium B2B marketplace platform that connects fruit and vegetable growers with buyers worldwide. We're committed to providing a secure, transparent, and efficient trading environment for all our users.
terms.questionsDesc: [HI] If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team. We're here to help clarify any concerns you may have.
terms.section1Content:
[HI] By accessing and using Fruit Habibi ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our B2B marketplace platform that connects premium fruit and vegetable growers with trusted buyers worldwide. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.section2Content:
[HI] Fruit Habibi provides a digital marketplace platform that enables:

тАв Product listing and discovery services
тАв Secure payment processing with escrow protection
тАв Communication tools between buyers and sellers
тАв Quality verification and dispute resolution
тАв International shipping coordination
тАв Business verification and trust scoring

We act as an intermediary platform and do not directly sell or purchase products listed by users.
terms.section3Content:
[HI] To use our platform, you must:

тАв Provide accurate and complete business information
тАв Maintain the security of your account credentials
тАв Complete business verification process
тАв Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activities. Business verification is required for all sellers and recommended for buyers.

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account and must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms.section4Content:
[HI] Users are strictly prohibited from:

тАв Listing counterfeit, illegal, or prohibited products
тАв Providing false or misleading product information
тАв Attempting to circumvent our payment system
тАв Engaging in fraudulent transactions
тАв Violating intellectual property rights
тАв Harassment or abuse of other users
тАв Manipulating reviews or ratings
тАв Using automated systems to access the platform
тАв Selling products outside of permitted categories

Violations may result in immediate account suspension and legal action.
terms.section5Content:
[HI] Payment Terms:

тАв All transactions are processed through our secure escrow system
тАв Platform fee: 3% of transaction value (2.5% for verified premium sellers)
тАв Payment processing fees may apply
тАв Refunds are subject to our dispute resolution process

Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery confirmation. We hold funds in escrow to protect both parties during the transaction.

All fees are clearly displayed before transaction completion. Currency conversion rates apply for international transactions.
terms.section6Content:
[HI] Dispute Process:

1. Direct Communication: Users must attempt to resolve issues directly first
2. Platform Mediation: Our team will mediate if direct resolution fails
3. Evidence Review: Both parties must provide relevant documentation
4. Resolution Timeline: Standard disputes resolved within 7 business days
5. Appeal Process: Users can appeal decisions within 48 hours

We reserve the right to:
тАв Issue full or partial refunds
тАв Suspend accounts during investigation
тАв Adjust trust scores based on dispute outcomes
тАв Escalate to legal authorities for serious violations

Our decision is binding unless overturned through the appeal process.
terms.section7Content:
[HI] Intellectual Property Rights:

тАв Users retain ownership of their product listings and content
тАв Users grant us license to display and promote their content on the platform
тАв We own all platform technology, design, and proprietary systems
тАв Trademark infringement is strictly prohibited
тАв Users must have rights to all images and content they upload

We respect intellectual property rights and will remove infringing content upon notification. Users who repeatedly infringe on IP rights may have their accounts terminated.
terms.section8Content:
[HI] Data Protection:

тАв We collect and process data as described in our Privacy Policy
тАв User data is protected with industry-standard security measures
тАв We may share data with trusted partners for service delivery
тАв Users can request data deletion subject to legal requirements
тАв International data transfers comply with applicable regulations

By using our platform, you consent to our data collection and processing practices. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining data security.
terms.section9Content:
[HI] Liability Limitations:

тАв Our platform is provided "as is" without warranties
тАв We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
тАв Our total liability is limited to fees paid to us in the preceding 12 months
тАв We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
тАв Users are responsible for their own business decisions

We act as an intermediary platform and are not responsible for:
тАв Product quality or condition
тАв Delivery delays or issues
тАв Business disputes between users
тАв Third-party service failures

Users participate at their own risk and should conduct due diligence.
terms.section10Content:
[HI] Account Termination:

We may suspend or terminate accounts for:
тАв Violation of these Terms of Service
тАв Fraudulent or illegal activities
тАв Non-payment of fees
тАв Misrepresentation of business information
тАв Harassment of other users

Users may terminate their accounts at any time by contacting support. Upon termination:
тАв Active transactions must be completed
тАв Outstanding fees must be paid
тАв Account data may be retained for legal compliance
тАв User content may be removed from public view
terms.section11Content:
[HI] Global Trade Requirements:

тАв Users must comply with all applicable international trade laws
тАв Export/import regulations must be followed
тАв Sanctions and embargo restrictions apply
тАв Customs documentation is user responsibility
тАв We may restrict transactions based on compliance requirements

Users are responsible for:
тАв Obtaining necessary permits and licenses
тАв Complying with destination country regulations
тАв Accurate customs declarations
тАв Payment of applicable duties and taxes

We reserve the right to block transactions that may violate trade laws.
terms.section12Content:
[HI] Modifications:

тАв We may update these Terms of Service from time to time
тАв Users will be notified of significant changes via email
тАв Continued use constitutes acceptance of new terms
тАв Users may terminate accounts if they disagree with changes
тАв Previous versions are available upon request

Changes may be made to:
тАв Reflect new services or features
тАв Comply with legal requirements
тАв Improve user experience
тАв Address security concerns

We encourage users to review terms periodically.
